Configuring WWNN and WWPN Pool

To configure the WWNN Pool, perform the following:

 1. Select the Organization from the drop-down list. By default, root is displayed.

 2. Enter the starting address in the From address text box.

 3. Enter the Number of Addresses and select Assignment Order from drop-down

 4. Click Add to generate world wide pool name.

Figure 6-2 WWNN Pool

 5. Click Save and next to proceed further.

To configure the WWPN Pool, perform the following:

 1. Select the Organization from the drop-down list. By default, root is displayed.

 2. Enter the starting address in the From address text box.

 3. Enter the Number of Addresses and select Assignment Order from drop-down.

 4. Click Add to generate world wide pool name.

Figure 6-3 WWPN Pool

 5. Click Save and next to proceed further.
